snippet: Politicians based in the north said they would not shelter any more migrants saved at sea, even as thousands more were being rescued from smugglers’ boats in distress.
abstract: Politicians in Italy's north say they will not shelter any more migrants rescued in Mediterranean Sea; announcement comes as rescuers pluck 6,000 more migrants from waters.
lead_paragraph: Politicians based in the north said they would not shelter any more migrants saved at sea, even as thousands more were being rescued from smugglers’ boats in distress.

headline.main: Italy: Politicians Vow to Spurn Migrants
headline.print_headline: Italy: Politicians Vow to Spurn Migrants
